titleStmt.title: SII 14.194: original edition by A. S. Ramanatha Ayyar
No. 194. (A.R. No. 642 of 1916.) ŚĒRMĀDĒVI, AMBASAMUDRAM TALUK, TIRUNELVELI DISTRICT. ON THE WEST AND NORTH WALLS OF THE CENTRAL SHRINE IN THE AMMAINĀTHA TEMPLE.

summary.p: This long inscription is dated in the 3rd year but the king's name is not specified at the beginning. It states that when Jaṭāvarmaṉ alias Uḍaiyār Śōḻapāṇḍyādēva was seated in the bathing room (tirumañjaṉaśālai) in the palace at Rājēndraśōḻapuram, the royal order of his father (nam ayyar) who has the historical introduction viramētuṇaiyagāvum (i.e., Vīrarājēndradēva) was received that certain lands belonging to the temple of Kailāsanātha at Nigarili ōḻa-chaturvēdimaṅgalam may be exempted from the payment of taxes from the third year, apparently of the Chōḷapāṇḍya viceroy, the necessary revenue instructions were issued to that effect. The document is worded in detail like the Chōḷa records of this period, and is attested by a number of officials in conformity with the revenue procedure prevalent at that time.

This Chōḷapāṇḍya viceroy was evidently the son of Vīrarājendradēva named Gaggaikoṇḍaśōḻaṉ on whom the title of Chōḷa-pāṇḍya had been conferred by his father.Ep. Ind., Vol. XI, p. 293. In a recordNo. 247 of 1929-30.from Āttūr in the same district there is reference to another son named Rājēndra-Chōḷa, who is said to have been granted the title of Chōḷapāṇḍya.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . yāṇṭu 3 ḷ 3 100 7- ṉāl Uttamacoḻavaḷanāṭṭu muḷḷi nāṭṭu nikarilicoḻac caturve
timaṅkalattu vaṭapāricattu muṭikoṇṭa coḻapperāṟṟiṉ teṉkaraiyil Eḻuntaruḷi Irukkum śrī
kayilāsamuṭaiya mahātevar � tevatāṉam Iṟaiyiliyāka variyiliṭṭapaṭi . yāṇṭu 2Āvatu nā
ḷ 3 100 8 10 8 ṉāl koccaṭaiyavaṉmarāṉa Uṭaiyār śrīcoḻapāṇṭiyatevar rājen=tiraco
ḻapurattuk koyiliṉuḷḷāl tirumañcaṉacālaiyilp paḷḷippiṭattu Eḻuntaruḷi Iruntu rājarājap
pāṇṭi nāṭṭu Uttamacoḻavaḷanāṭṭu muḷḷināṭṭu nikarilicoḻaccaturvetimaṅkalattu vaṭa �kattu mu
ṭikoṇṭacoḻap perāṟṟiṉ teṉkaraiyil Eḻuntaruḷi Irukkum śrī kayilāsamuṭaiya mahā tevarkku tevatāṉamā
ka muṭikoṇṭacoḻavaḷanāṭṭu melvempanāṭṭuk kallūr nilattil muṉpu It tevarkku tevatāṉamāy varukiṟa civa
pātacekaranallūroṭum Aṭaiya nilaṉāl veliyum Iṉṉilattāl namakku Iṟukkakkaṭava Iṟaiyum Ūrkkaḻañcum ku
marakkaccāṇamum taṟi Iṟai taṭṭārppāṭṭamum pāṭikāvalak kūliyu muḷḷiṭṭa Antarāyaṅkaḷum yāṇṭu 3- Āvatu mutal Itteva
rkku veṇṭum nivantaṅkaḷukku Iṟuppatāka tevatāṉa Iṟaiyiliyāka variyiliṭuvittuk kuṭukka veṉṟu virame tuṇai
yākavum tiyākame Aṇiyākavum ceṅkoloccik karuṅkali kaṭintu kūṭalcaṅkamattu Āhavama
llaṉai Añcuvittu vikkalaṉaiyum ciṅkaṇaṉaiyu muṭaipuṟaṅ kaṇṭu maṟṟavar mahāteviyaro
ṭum vastuvāhaṉaṅ kaikkoṇṭu vijaiyasiṅhāsaṉattu viṟṟiruntaruḷiya(ṉa) nammayyar tiru mukam pra
sādañ ceytaruḷi vantamaiyil muṭikoṇṭacoḻavaḷanāṭṭu melvempa nāṭṭuk kallūr nirnilattil Ittevar
tevatāṉam civapātacekaranallūrroṭum Aṭaiya nilaṉ kāl veliyum Iṉṉilattāl nilavopāti vanta
kāṇik kaṭaṉ kācu 3 10 2- kālum nel Aññūṟṟu Aṟupattu Eḻukalaṉe patakku nāṉāḻiyum Iv vūril
yāṇṭu 3Āvatu mutal curukki veṟu mutalākki Ivviṟai yāṇṭu 3Āvatu mutal Āṭṭā
ṇṭutoṟum niṉṟiṟaiyā vari Iṟuppatāka Iṟai kaṇṭu Iv viṟaiyum Iṉṉilattāl vanta Ūrk kaḻa
ñcum kumarakkaccāṇamum taṟi Iṟai taṭṭārppāṭṭam Uḷḷiṭṭa Iṟaipāṭṭa miṉ pāṭṭamum pāṭikāvalkkūliyu muḷḷiṭ
ṭa Antarāyaṅkaḷum Uttamacoḻavaḷanāṭṭu muḷḷi nāṭṭu nikarilicoḻac caturvetimaṅkalattu śrī ka
yilāsamuṭaiya mahādevarkkut tevatāṉamāy Iṉṉilam veḷḷāṉ vakaiyil mutalum veṟumu
talum paḻamppiyarum yāṇṭu 3Āvatu mutal tavirntu Ittevar tevatāṉam civapātacekara nallūroṭuṅ
kūṭi Orurāya Oru puravāy Ittevarkku veṇṭum nivantaṅkaḷukku Iṟuppatāka yāṇṭu 3Āvatu mutal te
vatāṉa Iṟaiyiliyāka variyiliṭat tiruvāymoḻintaruḷiṉāreṉṟu tirumantiravolai coḻa maṇṭalattu ni
ttaliṉota vaḷanāṭṭu Āvūrk kūṟṟattu viḷattūr kiḻavaṉ veḷāṉ coḻapāṇṭiyaṉāṉa kaṅkai koṇ
ṭa coḻa muventaveḷāṉ paṇiyālum tirumantiravolai nāyakam Iṉṉāṭṭu pāṇṭikulācaṉi vaḷanāṭṭu
coḻapāṇṭiyat nāṭāḻvāṉ Oppiṉālum yāṇṭu 3Āvatu 3 100 8 10 8- ṉālp pukunta keḻvi variyiliṭ
ṭuk koḷkaveṉṟu Atikārikaḷ coḻamaṇṭalattu Ūyakkoṇṭār vaḷanāṭṭut tirunaṟaiyūr nāṭṭut taṇṭantoṭ
ṭa muṭaiyār Utaiyativākara ṉamala ṉākaṉārāṉa Uttama coḻa muventaveḷārum viṭaiyi latikārikaḷ
kaṇṭarātitta muventaveḷārum kālakālakaṉṉa muventaveḷārum coḻa maṇṭalattu nitta viṉotavaḷanāṭ
ṭu Āvūrk kūṟṟattu mur Uṭaiyār Utaiyamāttāṇṭaṉ koṇālārāṉa kaṇṭarātitta muve(nta)
veḷārum rājarājap pāṇṭināṭṭu maturāntaka vaḷanāṭṭu Āṇmānāṭṭup parakecarinallūr kiḻāṉ
cilaipeṟṟāṉārāṉa rājativākaramuventaveḷārum Iṉṉāṭṭu coḻapāṇṭiyakkuḷakkiḻ veḷḷuṭaiyār
pūvaṇava ṉulakaḷantāṉārāṉa Uttamacoḻat tamiḻataraiyarum Iṉṉāṭṭu Irājentracoḻavaḷa ṉāṭṭu miḻa
laik kūṟṟattuka kiḻkūṟṟu jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻanallūr Uṭaiyār kumaraṉkoṉārāṉa vāṉavaṉ muventa
veḷārum Iṉṉāṭṭup poṉpaṟṟi Uṭaiyār paṭṭaṉ tāmotir(ā)ṉārāṉa rājarājap poṉ paṟṟi viḻupparai
yarum Eva puravuvari tiṇaikkaḷattuk kaṇkāṇi rājarājap pāṇṭināṭṭu maturāntaka vaḷanāṭṭu Aḻakiya pāṇ
ṭiyakkuḷakkiḻ nelkkuṭapai Uṭaiyāṉ centilātittaṉārāṉa rājakecari muventaveḷāṉum Iṉṉāṭam
māṉaviravaḷanāṭṭuk kamutakkuṭaiyāṉ Āccaṉ paramaṉāṉa Irakkāṭṭu coḻapāṇṭiya māṉaviravaḷa nāṭṭu muve
ntaveḷāṉum Iṉṉāṭṭu rājentracoḻavaḷanāṭṭu miḻalaik kūṟṟattu vaṭapāmpāṟṟu Aṇṭak kuṭaiyāṉ A
raiyaṉkkappa paṇṇittirap pallavaraiyaṉum puravuvari tiṇaikkaḷam Iṉṉāṭṭu miḻalaik kūṟṟattu va
ṭa llūr Uṭaiyāṉ tirukkāḷi cirāḷaṉāṉ civapātacekaramuventaveḷāṉum Iṉṉāṭṭu matu
ṉāṭṭu karaiyirukkai naralokacuntaranallūruṭaiyāṉ veḷāṉ mummuṭi coḻaṉāṉa rāja
ṉāṭṭu miḻalaik kūṟṟattu naṭuviṟ kūṟṟu ciparāntaka nallūrc cemmantai Uṭai
damaged
yāṉiṭaikkarai tevaṉum puravuvarināyakam coḻamaṇṭalattu [kṣa]ttracikāmaṇi
vaḷanāṭṭut tirunaṟaiyūr nāṭṭuc ceṟṟūrk kūṟṟattu Uḻavaceri Uṭaiyāṉ Araṅkaṉ poṟkkāriyāṉa
ravikularāja muventaveḷāṉum rājarājap pāṇṭināṭṭu miḻalaik kūṟṟattu naṭuviṟk kūṟṟu ciparāntakanallūr puṉ
kañceri Uṭaiyāṉ tevaṉ cūlapāṇiyum varippottakam Iṉṉāṭṭu tirukkāṉapperk kūṟṟattu ciṟukāṉapperu
ṭaiyāṉ kāvaṉ cattiyum coḻamaṇṭalattu Arumoḻiteva vaḷanāṭṭup piṟaṅkāḻiṭai nāṭṭuk kuḻalūruṭaiyā ṉakka
ṉ Eḻuvaṉum mukaveṭṭi rājarājap pāṇṭināṭṭu rājentracoḻa vaḷanāṭṭuk koṭuntaik kuḷamuṭaiyāṉ vaṉā
yāṉ Arintavaṉ muventaveḷaraṉum Iṉṉāṭṭu muṭikoṇṭacoḻa vaḷanāṭṭu Ārināṭṭu Iḷa nallūruṭai
yāṉ kūttāṭi jaṉaṉātaṉāṉa coḻakulacuntara muventaveḷāṉum varippottakak kaṇakku Iṉṉāṭṭu miḻalaik kūṟṟattu kiḻkkū
ṟṟu Uttamacoḻanallūr Uṭaiyāṉ kaṇṭaṉaraṅkaṉum Iṉṉāṭṭu maturāntaka vaḷanāṭṭu Āṇ mānāṭṭu maṇṇai koṇṭa
coḻa nallūr Uṭaiyāṉ veḷāṉ colaiyāṉa rājanaārāyaṇamuventa veḷāṉum Iṉṉāṭṭu vaṭatalaiccempi nā
ṭṭu maturāntaka nallūruṭaiyāṉ cūṟṟiyāṭkoṇṭāṉāṉa vikkiramaciṅkac cempi nāṭṭu muventa veḷāṉum Iṉṉāṭṭukki
ḻi ṇiyamuṭṭattuc ciṟutūruṭaiyāṉ caṭaiyaṉ kūttaṉāṉa cempiyaṉ variyili muventaveḷā ṉum vāyiliṭu Iṉṉāṭa
ṭu coṇāṭṭup pulvāyūruṭaiyāṉ koṟṟaṉ karuṇākaraṉum Iṉṉāṭṭut tirukkāṉapperk kūṟṟattu Uccāṉi Uṭaiyāṉ vikkiramaṉ
vītiviṭaṅkaṉum Iṉṉāṭṭu marutūruṭaiyāṉ ciṟiyāṉ cen=tilāṉa vikkiramacoḻac cūraṅkuṭi nāṭṭu viḻupparaiyaṉum coḻa
maṇṭalattu Ārkkāṭṭuk kūṟṟattuk karuppūruṭaiyāṉ Araiyaṉātittaṉum paṭṭolai rājarājap pāṇṭi nāṭṭu mi
ḻalaik kūṟṟattu kiḻkūṟṟu rājakesarinallūruṭaiyāṉ kaṇṭaṉ cun=taraṉum Iṉṉāṭṭu naṭuviṟk kūṟṟu cipārantakanal
lūr Uṭaiyāṉ kuvalaiyacantira ṉampalakkūttaṉāṉa nirupaviccātira viḻupparaiyaṉum Iṉṉāṭṭuc coḻa keraḷak kuḷakkiḻ nalva
yaluṭaiyāṉ caṅkaraṉ kaṇavatiyum variyiliṭuvitta puravuvaritiṇaikkaḷam civapātacekara muventa veḷāṉum rājacuntara muventave
ḷāṉum variyiliṭṭu vācitta varippottakak kaṇakku Uttamacoḻanallūruṭaiyāṉ kaṇṭa ṉaraṅkaṉum variyiliṭṭa variyiliṭu pulvāyū
ruṭaiyāṉ koṟṟaṉ karuṇakaraṉum paṭṭolai Eḻutiṉa paṭṭolai rājakesarinallūr Uṭaiyāṉ kaṇṭaṉ cuntaraṉum nal
vayaluṭaiyāṉ cakkaraṉ kaṇavatiyu miruntu yāṇṭu 3vatu nāḷ 3 100 8 10 8- ṉāl variyiliṭṭatu . Ippaṭi variyaliṭṭa
maikku puravuvari tiṇaikkaḷam rājarājap pāṇṭi nāṭṭu Irājentracoḻavaḷanāṭṭu miḻalaik kūṟṟattu vaṭapa mpāṟṟu Arumo
ḻi tavanallūruṭaiyāṉ tirukkāḷi cirāḷaṉāṉa civapātacekara muventaveḷāṉ Eḻuttu . puravu vari tiṇaikkaḷam Iṉṉāṭṭu pū
ṅkāṉanāṭṭuk karaiirukkai naralokacuntaranallūruṭaiyāṉ veḷāṉ mummaṭi coḻaṉāṉa rāja cuntara muventaveḷā
ṉeḻuttu . mukaveṭṭi Iṉṉāṭṭu Ārināṭṭu Iḷanallūruṭaiyāṉ kūttāṭi jaṉaṉātaṉāṉa coḻakulacuntara muventaveḷā
ṉeḻuttu .
Ivai mukaveṭṭi Iṉnāṭṭu mel Iraṇiya muṭṭattu koṭuntaik kuḷamuṭaiyāṉ
ḷāṉ Eḻuttu . Ivai puravuvaritiṇaikkaḷattuk kaṇkāṇi Iṉṉāṭṭu māṉavira vaḷanāṭṭu tirukkamutakkuṭi Uṭaiyāṉ Āccaṉ paramaṉāṉa parākkira
macoḻapāṇṭiya māṉaviravaḷanāṭṭu muventaveḷāṉ Eḻuttu Ivai puravuvari tiṇaikkaḷattu varippottakakkaṇakku Iṉṉāṭṭuk kiḻiraṇiyamuṭṭattu
ciṟutūruṭaiyāṉa caṭaiyaṉ kūttaṉāṉa cempoṉ Eyili muventaveḷāṉ Eḻuttu . variyiliṭu Iṉṉāṭṭu coṇāṭṭu pulavāyūruṭaiyāṉ koṟṟa ka
karaṉ Eḻuttu . Ivai puravuvari tiṇaikkaḷattu varippottakakkaṇakku Iṉṉāṭṭu miḻalaik kūṟṟattuk kiḻkūṟṟu Uttama coḻanallūr Uṭaiyāṉ kaṇṭaṉa raṅ
kaṉ Eḻuttu . Ivai puravuvari tiṇaikkaḷattu ṭṭu miḻalaik kūṟṟattu kiḻkūṟṟu rājakecarinallūruṭaiyāṉ kaṇṭaṉ cuntaraṉContinuation lost.
Digital edition of SII 14.194 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
